contentencoded:
Cyprus has until Monday to come up with a new bailout package after the parliament rejected an initial plan which called for a controversial tax on the country’s bank deposits.

There was a big shakeup this week in the gaming industry when the head of Electronic Arts resigned on Monday after a high-profile debacle involving the new Sim City game.

Youtube announced that it’s reached a billion viewers per month, putting in the same league as Facebook and its parent company Google.
title: PODCAST: Sim City blues, Youtube 'Woo's!'
teaser: The pressure mounts on Cyprus, Youtube hits a billion monthly users, and why a Sim City debacle cost a CEO his job.
